Aim training/reacting + general game and map knowledge. All you need to practice for other shooters unless they have their own special perks like: Parkour, Building, and running from a storm!

This is a great game, sometimes Valve and I don't really see eye to eye but this game has let me make many great friends online and dispite the sometimes toxic community you normally find people just trying to have a good time. However Competeitive matchmaking is horrific, but this doesn't take away from the enjoyability of the game.
